message: is there a way to know in KRL the  event_domain ( pageview, web, explicit ) and event_type ( kynetx.com, ev_somewebevent, ev_someexplicitevent  )
this is nearly impossible with complex event expressions, but you can determine which event it was by writing a rule that only matches part of the OR expression.
you can also pass an additional variable as event context to help you sort them out.
